Patch Notes
February 25th, 2025
    UI update for all sim for mobiles.
    Dungeon sim count fix
    Update by Shykai
December 27th, 2024
    Added profit to all simulations table
November 25th, 2024
    Monster combat stats bugfix
November 23rd, 2024
    Added Observatory house room
November 20th, 2024
  • Updated items and abilities to match Test server changes
  • 1) Revert frost surge damage ratio change back to 100%, decrease evasion debuff from 20% to 15%
    2) Increase entangle damage ratio from 50% to 52%
    3) Increase smoke burst damage ratio from 160% to 180%
    4) Increase arcane reflection buff from 20% to 25%
November 15th, 2024
  • Updated items, new pouches and effects
November 12th, 2024
  • Updated entangle spell
November 9th, 2024
  • Updated items (new ultra coffees)
September 22nd, 2024
  • Changed bulwark to reduce accuracy instead of damage
September 20th, 2024
  • Fixed a bug with revive making it say you went oom
September 17th, 2024
  • Added Griffin Bulwark weapon
  • Added Arcane Reflect ability
  • Added Elemental thorns and weakening
  • Increased healing experience gained by 50%
September 3rd, 2024
  • Fixed bug with players being simmed when not selected
  • Fixed bug with players incorrectly saying they went out of mana
  • You can now rename players locally
  • Item drops are now more accurate based on number of players
August 10th, 2024
  • Import bugfix
  • Dungeons should refresh hp and mana upon starting a new one
  • Bumped up the number of enemies to display damage dealt and taken to 25
August 9th, 2024
  • Dungeons
  • Still missing some UI elements and probably some bugs
August 7th, 2024
  • Group combat or something..
  • Sim all zones functionality
  • Other small UI changes
  • (new) Ability bug fix
  • (newer) Threat buff bug fix
June 26th, 2024
  • Mayhem now gives miss XP if it misses the last target
June 26th, 2024
  • Updated game data
  • Tenacity no longer affects curse
  • Mayhem no longer gives XP for missing
  • Mayhem now properly shows autoattack hit rate
June 25th, 2024
  • Updated game data
June 24th, 2024
  • Updated game data
  • Autoattack modifier on gloves now works
June 22nd, 2024
  • Fixed issue with untradeable item prices
  • Chests average value is now calculated and autofilled
  • Fixed Dark Mode CSS for tables
June 7th, 2024
  • Updated game data
  • Fixed base threat display
June 3rd, 2024
  • Updated game data
  • Fixed some dark mode CSS
June 3rd, 2024
  • Updated game data
  • Added Attack Speed
  • Removed Promote Special Ability since players can't get it
  • Enemy ability cooldowns randomly started somewhere between having No CD(Instant Cast) and being on Max CD. They now start somewhere between Half of Max CD and Max CD. They always wait at least half of the CD to cast now. This means enemy ability damage is now lower.
May 31st, 2024
  • Updated game data
May 31st, 2024
  • Updated game data
  • Added Back slot
  • Added new skills and their effects
May 2nd, 2024
  • Updated game data
May 1st, 2024
  • Fixed 2h bug
  • Fixed bug with enemy dying to DoT and having nothing to attack
May 1st, 2024
  • Updated game data
  • Added new auto attack multiplier
Apr 30th, 2024
  • Added the 3 remaining weapon special effects
Apr 30th, 2024
  • Fixed time spent on boss
Apr 27th, 2024
  • Updated game data
  • Added Dookie Bow and Dung Crossbow for this patch only
Apr 26th, 2024
  • Updated game data
  • Changed spawns and loot to match the game's new Elite Tier system
  • Added Pierce
Apr 9th, 2024
  • Fixed a bug with Quick Aid
Apr 8th, 2024
  • Fixed a bug with Revive
Apr 8th, 2024
  • Added Revive Functionality
Mar 13th, 2024
  • Updated Game Data
  • Added HP Spending for Abilities
  • Added HP Spending Tracker for Player
  • Added Elite Zone Bonuses
  • Drop Rates now correctly cap at 100% for no RNG profit
  • Doubled Healing Magic XP
Mar 4th, 2024
  • Updated Game Data
  • Added Special Ability Slot
  • Added Threat Calculations
  • Added Elite Only Abilities
  • Added Elite Only Drops
  • Added New Triggers
  • Added Support for Most New Abilities/Auras
Jan 24th, 2024
  • Fixed a normal monster stat bug
Jan 24th, 2024
  • Added Elite Monsters
  • Updated Game Data
Nov 13th, 2023
  • Fixed Lucky Coffee Bug
  • Added casts/h
Nov 10th, 2023
  • % Penetration no longer affects negative resistance
October 27th, 2023
  • Fixed a bug with house buffs and consumables
October 26th, 2023
  • Updated game data
October 24th, 2023
  • Added house rooms
October 21st, 2023
  • Updated game data
October 19th, 2023
  • Fixed monster attack speed (It's higher now)
October 19th, 2023
  • Updated game data
  • Added attack speed from attack levels (0.05% per level)
October 2nd, 2023
  • Changed magic evasion formula to (0.75*Defense + 0.25*Ranged) from (Defence+Ranged)/2
September 29th, 2023
  • You can now pick between BO/SO for your default prices
  • Added a no RNG drops feature
  • Fixed a bug that prevented some from copying the export to their clipboard.
